sen.e: Since his older brother Nobutoshi MATSUDAIRA, who was originally planned to succeed to the position of family head, died in 1865, Nobumasa was adopted by Nobuyoshi MATSUDAIRA to succeed to the position in 1866 and become the eighth lord.

sen.j: 幕末期は佐幕派だったが、慶応4年（1868年）の戊辰戦争で新政府の圧力を受けて降伏し、東征に参加している。
sen.e: He was one of the Sabaku-ha (supporters of the Shogun) at the end of Edo period, and then surrendered under the pressure from the new government in the Boshin Civil War in 1868 to participate in an expeditionary force to the east.
